creator: SEPHORA
descriptionHtml:
Unlock a world of beauty! Explore the latest makeup, fragrance, skincare, haircare and beauty accessories only on Sephora.sa. The Sephora App is a one stop destination to shop all your favorite brands.
If you are a makeup addict, you can find the latest makeup brands at Sephora such as Huda Beauty, Fenty Beauty, Tarte, Sephora Collection, BECCA, Marc Jacobs, Too Faced, Anastasia Beverly Hills, Urban Decay, Benefit Cosmetics, NARS, Make Up For Ever and more. Explore our range of mascara’s, eye palettes, foundations and concealers for all skin types.
Find the perfect skincare routine for your skin with our wide assortment of skincare products from world renown bestselling brands. Resolve any skin concerns you might have by trying the latest products from Origins, GlamGlow, Starskin, Dr. Jart+, La Mer, Pixi, Lancôme and Estee Lauder.
Experiencing a bad hair day? Not anymore! Just try any of the hair products we offer from the top haircare brands available at Sephora such as Ouai, Aveda, Briogeo and Dyson.
Finding the perfume that truly reflects your personality can be easy with our wide selection of perfumes that includes all-time bestsellers, new launches and gift sets. Find all of the iconic perfumes from top brands such as Dior, Gucci, Givenchy, Dolce & Gabbana, Tom Ford, Yves Saint Laurent, Lancôme and Ne’emah.
The Sephora Saudi Arabia mobile application will provide you with an exceptional online shopping experience with free delivery & gifts with purchase. You are granted easy access to your favorite brands, latest products, exclusive app offers, early previews to sales & Black Fridays as well as inspiring beauty trends and tips. You can also easily link your Beauty Pass to your Sephora account to view your point balance and redeem your gifts. If you made an order recently, you can track the status of your orders and view all the previous orders made instore and online. The Sephora App will always point out Sephora stores near you in Jeddah, Riyadh, Mecca, Dammam, Khobar, Tabuk & Ta'if so you can plan your next store visit to indulge yourself with a quick makeover with any of the beauty services available in the store you have selected.
Download the Sephora Saudi Arabia app now to shop anywhere and anytime!

If you are a makeup addict, you can find the latest makeup brands at Sephora such as Huda Beauty, Fenty Beauty, Tarte, Sephora Collection, BECCA, Marc Jacobs, Too Faced, Anastasia Beverly Hills, Urban Decay, Benefit Cosmetics, NARS, Make Up For Ever and more. Explore our range of mascara’s, eye palettes, foundations and concealers for all skin types.
Find the perfect skincare routine for your skin with our wide assortment of skincare products from world renown bestselling brands. Resolve any skin concerns you might have by trying the latest products from Origins, GlamGlow, Starskin, Dr. Jart+, La Mer, Pixi, Lancôme and Estee Lauder.
Experiencing a bad hair day? Not anymore! Just try any of the hair products we offer from the top haircare brands available at Sephora such as Ouai, Aveda, Briogeo and Dyson.
Finding the perfume that truly reflects your personality can be easy with our wide selection of perfumes that includes all-time bestsellers, new launches and gift sets. Find all of the iconic perfumes from top brands such as Dior, Gucci, Givenchy, Dolce & Gabbana, Tom Ford, Yves Saint Laurent, Lancôme and Ne’emah.
The Sephora Saudi Arabia mobile application will provide you with an exceptional online shopping experience with free delivery & gifts with purchase. You are granted easy access to your favorite brands, latest products, exclusive app offers, early previews to sales & Black Fridays as well as inspiring beauty trends and tips. title: SEPHORA Saudi Arabia سيفورا

creator: SEPHORA
descriptionHtml:
Sephora is your destination for top beauty brands and best-sellers in makeup, fragrances, skincare and haircare. Get a head start by downloading the Sephora App, now available on the App Store in Saudi Arabia. It’s time to get personal access to the world of beauty!
Sephora Features:
World Class SKINCARE:
Sephora offers you facial care products for all types of skin. Sensitive, oily, combination or dry skin - choose from best-selling and innovative skin care products, makeup removers or serums to restore the beautiful, natural radiance to your skin.
Exciting MAKEUP:
An absolute beauty must-have, makeup can be your best friend! An incredible selection of cosmetics for a fresh-looking complexion, vibrant lips or smoky eyes is waiting for you. Best-sellers or new arrivals, Sephora puts the fun back in makeup.
Mesmerizing FRAGRANCE:
Perfume is far more than just a fragrance at Sephora. You can express all the facets of your unique personality with the floral and aromatic top notes of an eau de toilette or opt for a more concentrated perfume to reflect your inner mood and express yourself. Sephora offers all the best-selling fragrances along with a variety of new perfumes, giving you the opportunity to discover your own signature scent.
Rejuvenating HAIRCARE:
Now you can have the hair of your dreams with Sephora specialty products. Choose from a dazzling array to suit your hair's specific needs: moisturizing, volume or shine - you can finally enjoy a hair routine that fits your personal style. From shampooing to a hint of fragrance, Sephora unlocks the door to beautiful, healthy hair.
If you are a makeup addict, you can find the latest makeup brands at Sephora such as Huda Beauty, Fenty Beauty, Tarte, Sephora Collection, BECCA, Marc Jacobs, Too Faced, Anastasia Beverly Hills, Urban Decay, Benefit Cosmetics, NARS, Make Up for Ever and more. Explore our range of mascara’s, eye palettes, foundations, and concealers for all skin types.
You can also the perfect skincare routine for your skin with our wide assortment of skincare products from world renown bestselling brands. Resolve any skin concerns you might have by trying the latest products from Origins, GlamGlow, Starskin, Dr. Jart+, La Mer, Pixi, Lancôme and Estee Lauder.
Experiencing a bad hair day? Not anymore! Just try any of the hair products we offer from the top haircare brands available at Sephora such as Ouai, Aveda, Briogeo and Dyson.
Finally, you can find the right perfume that truly reflects your personality with our wide selection of fragrances that includes all-time bestsellers, new launches and gift sets. Find all of the iconic perfumes from top brands such as Dior, Gucci, Givenchy, Dolce & Gabbana, Tom Ford, Yves Saint Laurent, Lancôme and much more.
The Sephora Middle East mobile app will provide you with an exceptional online shopping experience. You are granted easy access to your favorite brands, latest products, exclusive app offers, early previews to sales & Black Friday as well as inspiring beauty trends and tips. You can also easily link your Beauty Pass to your Sephora account to view your point balance and redeem your gifts. You can also track the status of your orders made in-store and online. It’s time to stock up on your favorite lipsticks, our most glamorous mascaras & eyeshadows on top of our best-selling fragrances and the most sought-after skincare products. Be sure to check out our fascinating selection of men's fragrance and skin care brands as well. We have something for everyone to enjoy!

Other Features
- Get early access to Exclusive products
- Get the latest trends and advices with our Beauty Pass section
- Geo-locate the nearest stores to you
- Get Fast Delivery, Minis & Free Samples with EVERY order
- Benefit from secure payments

Download the Sephora Saudi app now to shop anywhere and anytime!

Sephora is your destination for top beauty brands and best-sellers in makeup, fragrances, skincare and haircare. Get a head start by downloading the Sephora App, now available on the App Store in Saudi Arabia. It’s time to get personal access to the world of beauty!
Sephora Features:
World Class SKINCARE:
Sephora offers you facial care products for all types of skin. Sensitive, oily, combination or dry skin - choose from best-selling and innovative skin care products, makeup removers or serums to restore the beautiful, natural radiance to your skin.
Exciting MAKEUP:
An absolute beauty must-have, makeup can be your best friend! An incredible selection of cosmetics for a fresh-looking complexion, vibrant lips or smoky eyes is waiting for you. Best-sellers or new arrivals, Sephora puts the fun back in makeup.
Mesmerizing FRAGRANCE:
Perfume is far more than just a fragrance at Sephora. You can express all the facets of your unique personality with the floral and aromatic top notes of an eau de toilette or opt for a more concentrated perfume to reflect your inner mood and express yourself. Sephora offers all the best-selling fragrances along with a variety of new perfumes, giving you the opportunity to discover your own signature scent.
Rejuvenating HAIRCARE:
Now you can have the hair of your dreams with Sephora specialty products. Choose from a dazzling array to suit your hair's specific needs: moisturizing, volume or shine - you can finally enjoy a hair routine that fits your personal style. From shampooing to a hint of fragrance, Sephora unlocks the door to beautiful, healthy hair.
If you are a makeup addict, you can find the latest makeup brands at Sephora such as Huda Beauty, Fenty Beauty, Tarte, Sephora Collection, BECCA, Marc Jacobs, Too Faced, Anastasia Beverly Hills, Urban Decay, Benefit Cosmetics, NARS, Make Up for Ever and more. Explore our range of mascara’s, eye palettes, foundations, and concealers for all skin types.
You can also the perfect skincare routine for your skin with our wide assortment of skincare products from world renown bestselling brands. Resolve any skin concerns you might have by trying the latest products from Origins, GlamGlow, Starskin, Dr. Jart+, La Mer, Pixi, Lancôme and Estee Lauder.
Experiencing a bad hair day? Not anymore! Just try any of the hair products we offer from the top haircare brands available at Sephora such as Ouai, Aveda, Briogeo and Dyson.
Finally, you can find the right perfume that truly reflects your personality with our wide selection of fragrances that includes all-time bestsellers, new launches and gift sets. Find all of the iconic perfumes from top brands such as Dior, Gucci, Givenchy, Dolce & Gabbana, Tom Ford, Yves Saint Laurent, Lancôme and much more.
The Sephora Middle East mobile app will provide you with an exceptional online shopping experience. You are granted easy access to your favorite brands, latest products, exclusive app offers, early previews to sales & Black Friday as well as inspiring beauty trends and tips. You can also easily link your Beauty Pass to your Sephora account to view your point balance and redeem your gifts. You can also track the status of your orders made in-store and online. It’s time to stock up on your favorite lipsticks, our most glamorous mascaras & eyeshadows on top of our best-selling fragrances and the most sought-after skincare products. Be sure to check out our fascinating selection of men's fragrance and skin care brands as well. We have something for everyone to enjoy!

Other Features
- Get early access to Exclusive products
- Get the latest trends and advices with our Beauty Pass section
- Geo-locate the nearest stores to you
- Get Fast Delivery, Minis & Free Samples with EVERY order
- Benefit from secure payments

Download the Sephora Saudi app now to shop anywhere and anytime!

Mesmerizing FRAGRANCE:

You can express all the facets of your unique personality with the floral and aromatic top notes of an eau de toilette or opt for a more concentrated perfume to reflect your inner mood and express yourself. Sephora offers all the best-selling fragrances along with a variety of new perfumes, giving you the opportunity to discover your own signature scent.
Rejuvenating HAIRCARE:
Now you can have the hair of your dreams with Sephora specialty products. Choose from a dazzling array to suit your hair's specific needs: moisturizing, volume or shine - you can finally enjoy a hair routine that fits your personal style. From shampooing to a hint of fragrance, Sephora unlocks the door to beautiful, healthy hair.
